summary: Re-coulor of Spellbreaker Shield to go better with Ebony Mail
descriptionHtml:
A darker texture of the Spellbreaker Shield, makes it look more deep, rusted gold rather than yellow.. this was made for personal use but no harm i sharing, im sure someone shares my taste..
 matches best with Ebony Retexture; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1092

Install:

Extract to:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Armor

Please feel free to PM/Comment if you would like a specific recolour, i have no skill for changing meshes, (i did try and ended up with  a dodecahedron steel shield) but have plenty of time for recolours
author: Cuzimazz
